code: import axios from'axios';var APIurl="http://132.148.157.71:5021/api/api";export function updatePost(post){return axios.post(APIurl+'/updatePost',post);}export function loadPosts(){fetch(APIurl+'/loadPosts').then(function(data){return data.json();}).then(function(res){return console.log(res.data);});}export function loadPostImages(){fetch(APIurl+'/loadPostImages').then(function(data){return data.json();}).then(function(res){return console.log(res.data);});}export function getPost(_id){fetch(APIurl+'/getPost',_id).then(function(data){return data.json();}).then(function(res){return console.log(res.data);});}export function loadfilteredAgendas(skip){fetch(APIurl+'/loadfilteredAgendas',skip).then(function(data){return data.json();}).then(function(res){return console.log(res.data);});}export function deletePostImage(id){return axios.delete(APIurl+'/deletePostImage/'+id,{data:{id:id}});}export function deletePost(id){return axios.delete(APIurl+'/deletePost/'+id,{data:{id:id}});}export function uploadPostImage(image){var data=new FormData();data.append('file',image);return axios.post(APIurl+'/uploadPostImage',data,{headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}).then(function(res){return res;}).catch(function(err){return err;});}export function uploadPresentationImage(image){var data=new FormData();data.append('file',image);return
